de.dfki.oms.history

Class OMMConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.oms.history.OMMConfig

  • public class OMMConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles a memory's versioning and persistence.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OMMConfig(java.lang.String memoryName, boolean init)
      Constructor.

      Adds a history element for a memory version.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OMMConfig

        public OMMConfig(java.lang.String memoryName,
                 boolean init)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        memoryName - Name of the object memory to configure.
        init - True, if memory should be saved initially (otherwise it is only loaded).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the memory does not exist.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentVersion

        public int getCurrentVersion()
        Retrieves the memory's current version.
        Returns:
        Version number as an int.

      • setCurrentVersion

        public void setCurrentVersion(int version)
        Sets the current version to a new value and issues a save operation.
        Parameters:
        version - The new version number.

      • isDeleteDisabled

        public boolean isDeleteDisabled()
        Checks whether the memory can be deleted.
        Returns:
        True, if memory deletion is disabled.

      • getOwnerBlock

        public de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock getOwnerBlock()
        Retrieves the owner information of the object memory in block form.
        Returns:
        Owner information as OMMBLock.

      • setOwnerBlock

        public void setOwnerBlock(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block)
        Sets the owner information of the object memory and issues a save operation.
        Parameters:
        block - New owner information as OMMBLock.

      • getHistoryElement

        public OMMHistoryElement getHistoryElement(int version)
        Retrieves the memory's history element for a given version.
        Parameters:
        version - The version as an int.
        Returns:
        The OMMHistoryElement belonging to that version (or null if none can be found).

      • getHistoryElementsHM

        public java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Integer,OMMHistoryElement> getHistoryElementsHM()
        Retrieves all history elements of the object memory.
        Returns:
        A SortedMap<Integer, OMMHistoryElement> mapping version number to respective history element.

      • getMostRecentHistoryElement

        public OMMHistoryElement getMostRecentHistoryElement()
        Retrieves the memory's history element for the current version.
        Returns:
        The current OMMHistoryElement.

      • addHistoryElement

        public void addHistoryElement(int version,
                              OMMHistoryElement element)
        Adds a history element for a memory version.
        Parameters:
        version - The version for which to add the history.
        element - The OMMHistoryElement for that version.

      • clearHistory

        public void clearHistory()
        Deletes the history elements for all versions of the object memory and issues a save operation.

      • deleteMemory

        public void deleteMemory()
        Deletes the memory and its whole folder.
